titleStmt.title: The magistrates charter examined, or his duty and dignity opened In a sermon preached at an assises, held at Sarum in the county of Wiltes, on the ninth day of March, last past, 1614. By Bartholomevv Parsons Batchelour in Diuinity, and vicar of Collingborne Kingstone in the diocesse of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Bartholomew, 1574-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Nicholas Okes, for Mathevv Lavv, and are to bee sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Fox,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The magistrates charter examined, or his dutie and dignitie opened.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Fox
